duration_in_months: 24months, possible additional 3 years with option to extend
full_summary:
#### Tender Announcement
### Request for Proposal (RFP) from Potential Contractors

#### **General Information**

* **Tender Title**: Smart Building Program
* **Contracting Authority**: Defence Construction Canada
* **Procurement Reference**: MX-22689850908
* **Publication Date**: 2023-02-23
* **Closing Date and Time**: 2023-05-04, 2:00 PM EST
* **Evaluation Criteria**: To be provided in the RFP document.

#### **Scope of Work**

Defence Construction Canada invites qualified contractors to submit proposals for the Smart Building Program. This program aims to provide "as and when required" work to support Department of National Defence requirements.

#### **Expected Outcomes**

* Establish a Regional Standing Offer (SO) with the successful contractor
* Provide services on an "as and when required" basis
* Estimated maximum value of the SO: $5,365,000.00
* Contract duration: 2 years with the option to extend for up to 3 additional years

#### **Key Service Requirements**

* Installation Services - Stand-Alone System
* Installation Services - Centralized System
* Deployment Services - Stand-Alone System
* Deployment Services - Centralized System
* Reporting Services - Tier 1, 2, and 3
* End of Term Services
* Decommissioning Services

#### **Additional Information**

* Interested contractors must submit their proposals through the MERX Electronic Bidding System
* All documents are available on MERX
* Contract award results will be posted on the Defence Construction Canada website
* Contact information for the contracting authority is as follows:
	* Name: Amanda Eid
	* Email: amanda.eid@dcc-cdc.gc.ca
	* Phone: 343-540-6713

#### **Notice URL**
https://www.merx.com/public/solicitations/2426903121/abstract?language=EN

https://www.merx.com/public/solicitations/2426903121/abstract?language=FR
